isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 2000, 4000, 8000 - CHASSIS ACCESSORIES - DESCRIPTION - Two Speed Axle Wiring With Allison (Electronic) Automatic Transmission

svcproc.title: Two Speed Axle Wiring With Allison (Electronic) Automatic Transmission
svcproc.para: A two speed rear axle is used when deep gear reduction and higher speeds are required. The axle is shifted with an air cylinder or electric motor depending on option. The two speed axle shift switch wiring provides a voltage signal to the transmission electronic control unit (ECU). The ECU then signals the engine electronic control module (ECM). the ECM then adjusts the signal being sent to the speedometer and odometer in order to show the correct speed and mileage when the rear axle assembly is shifted to a different gear ratio.
